<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import Chart from 'chart.js/auto';

export default {
  name: 'AccountChart',
  props: {
    account: Object,
  },
  setup(props) {
    const chartCanvas = ref(null);

    onMounted(() => {
      if (props.account) {
        const ctx = chartCanvas.value.getContext('2d');
        const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
          type: 'line',
          data: {
            // Customize chart data based on transactions and account details
            // Example data structure: labels, datasets, etc.
          },
        });
      }
    });

    return {
      chartCanvas,
    };
  },
};
</script>
